column1: “Tim Ryan when he ran for president two years ago … supported banning fracking both on public lands and generally speaking.”
“Everyone but Trump invited to royal funeral.”

Joe Biden threatened to assassinate Ukraine’s former president.

“Incomes are up.”
Leaked messages “between former President Barack Obama and Judge Reinhart foreshadowed the unlawful raid on former Trump’s Mar-a-Lago estate.”
The American Rescue Plan “helped create nearly 10 million new jobs.”
“Jill Biden makes stunning admission after” President Joe Biden tested positive for COVID-19.
“Biden threatens to assassinate Ukraine president.”
"President Barack Hussein Obama kept 33 million pages of documents, much of them classified. How many of them pertained to nuclear? Word is, lots!"
Sri Lanka’s president, Estonia’s prime minister and Ukrainian diplomats were arrested.
President Donald Trump was in a presidential limousine as he left his Jan. 6, 2021, rally at the White House Ellipse.
“Biden impeachment in progress.”
“Joe Biden just resigned from the White House.”
Says Barack Obama announced Joe Biden’s death.
Joe Biden resigned and “Trump is the new president.”
“Donald Trump authorized up to 20,000 National Guard troops to protect the Capitol" before Jan. 6, 2021, but was "rejected" by Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer.
Videos show that Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy uses cocaine.
“The White House presented commemorative coins” dedicated to Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.
“Inflation has gone up every month of the Biden presidency and just hit another 40-year high.”
“When President Biden took office … there was no vaccine available.”
"For four years, I was a full professor at the University of Pennsylvania."
A video shows Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy singing “Imagine” by John Lennon.
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky wore a Nazi cross symbol.
"Ukraine was the No. 1 donor to Hillary Clinton when she was running for president.”
"The latest with the Durham report is that the Clinton campaign … actually spied on the president of the United States.”
Joe Biden's cancellation of the Keystone pipeline "dramatically increased Americans' dependence on Russian oil."
“I’ve been in and out of Iraq and Afghanistan over 40 times.”
“Our economy created over 6.5 million new jobs just last year, more jobs in one year than ever before in the history of the United States of America.”
Donald Trump “never left” the White House.
“Clarence Thomas is about to become the only member of the current Supreme Court who was nominated by a president of one party and confirmed by a Senate controlled by the other party.”
“There's never been a president (before Joe Biden) that has made race and gender the defining factor” for a Supreme Court nomination.
A schedule proves Donald Trump was recently participating in presidential activities.
“President Trump sanctioned Russia. President Biden gave them a pipeline.”
President Joe Biden “has the lowest approval rating of any president ever.”
“Trump was secretly inaugurated as president of the restored Republic.”
“We’ve created more jobs in the first eight months of my administration than any president in American history — total number of jobs created.”
The White House “created a fake set for (President Joe) Biden to get his booster shot. The entire Biden presidency is one giant charade.”
Says President Joe Biden fell asleep during a meeting with Israel’s prime minister.
The man next to Mike Pompeo in a November 2020 photo “is the guy the Trump administration helped get out of jail in 2018 and who is now the 'president' of Afghanistan."
Says Haitian President Jovenel Moïse was going to “expose Clinton Foundation fraud” before he was assassinated.
Haiti, Tanzania and Madagascar refused the COVID-19 vaccines and now all three of their presidents have died unexpectedly.
“We have now created over 3 million jobs since I took office, more jobs than have ever been created in the first five months of any presidency in modern history.”
Says Donald Trump signed the Insurrection Act and “still is president.”

"Republicans support everything you think of when you think of ‘infrastructure.’ Roads, bridges, ports, airports, waterways, high-speed broadband — we’re in for all of that! … Less than 6% of the president's plan goes to roads and bridges."
“Human trafficking and drugs” at the Mexico border have “doubled, tripled and quadrupled” since Joe Biden became president.
“70% of Americans don't believe a word the mainstream media puts out,” so “everyone who thinks Biden won are only 30% of the population.”
"No one working 40 hours a week should live below the poverty line."
"Decades ago we used to invest 2% of our GDP on research and development. Today, that’s less than 1%."
"Nearly 90% of the infrastructure jobs created in the American Jobs Plan don’t require a college degree. 75% don’t require an associate’s degree."
"There’s a broad consensus of economists — left, right, center — and they agree that what I’m proposing will help create millions of jobs and generate historic economic growth."
"Thanks to the American Rescue Plan, we are on track to cut child poverty in America in half this year."
The recession caused by the coronavirus pandemic was "the worst economic crisis since the Great Depression."
"A recent study shows that 55 of the nation’s biggest corporations paid zero in federal income tax last year."

"In the 1990s, we passed universal background checks and a ban on assault weapons and high-capacity magazines that hold 100 rounds that can be fired in seconds. … Mass shootings and gun violence declined. But in the early 2000s, that law expired, and we’ve seen the daily bloodshed since."
"We won’t ignore what our intelligence agencies have determined to be the most lethal terrorist threat to the homeland today: white supremacist terrorism."

"When I was vice president, the president asked me to focus on providing help needed to address the root causes of migration. And it helped keep people in their own countries instead of being forced to leave. The plan was working, but the last administration decided it was not worth it."
"It will be easier to vote early in Georgia than in Democrat-run New York."
"Our public schools should have reopened months ago. .... Private and religious schools did. Science has shown for months that schools are safe."
Under President Donald Trump, "wages were growing faster for the bottom 25% than the top 25%."
"Just before COVID, we had … the lowest unemployment ever recorded for African Americans, Hispanics, and Asian Americans. The lowest for women in nearly 70 years."
Diesel prices jumped from $1.69 to $3.19 since Biden took office, and the president is to blame.
Says Joe Biden executive orders caused price increases of 50 cents in gas and 10% in food.
"While he was president, President Trump never encouraged Americans to get vaccinated."
"The fastest-growing population in the United States is Hispanic."
"We are seeing (gasoline) prices now that we frankly haven't seen in years."
Says Joe Biden’s inauguration was fake and he is not the legitimate president.
“I believe, without having definitive proof, that the military is in charge of our country ... because Joe Biden is an illegal president.”
The second presidential impeachment of Donald Trump was “the most bipartisan impeachment in American history.”
"Trump signs Insurrection Act - General Flynn to be appointed vice president."
Kamala Harris is planning to use the 25th Amendment against Joe Biden and appoint Mike Pence as her vice president.
Says Joe Biden “has issued more executive fiats than anyone in such a short period of time, ever, more than Obama, more than Trump, more than anyone.”
"We built the greatest economy in the history of the world."
Veterans "can go out, and they can see a doctor if they have to wait long periods of time. ... We didn’t have any of those rights before when I came on."
"We just got 75 million votes."
"One of the things we're very, very proud of is the selection of almost 300 federal judges and 3 great Supreme Court justices. That's a very big number. That's a record-setting number."
"We also got tax cuts — the largest tax cut and reform in the history of our country, by far."
"Since the start of my presidency, my economic plan has helped ... achieve zero percent inflation in July."
Trump "had a “standing order … that documents removed from the Oval Office and taken to the [Mar-a-Lago] residence were deemed to be declassified the moment he removed them.”

Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has a monthly income of $11 million.
President Joe Biden mistakenly read the cues off the teleprompter when he said “end of quote” and “repeat the line."
“4,000 percent increase in fentanyl" under President Biden on the southern border.
"When President Biden took office ... there was no [COVID-19] vaccine available."
President Joe Biden has "[s]topped abortion."
President Joe Biden said children “don’t belong to parents” when they’re in the classroom.
“Don’t listen to my Republican friends in Congress — last year, we reduced — my budget reduced the — the deficit by $350 billion."
"Ukrainian President [Zelensky] fled Kiev abandoning his people [and] broadcasts Presidential videos with a green screen."
"Russian president Vladimir Putin meets with South Korean President."

"So after 50 years of being virtually empty, I built up our oil reserves during my administration ... to 100% full. It’s called the Strategic National Reserves, and it hasn’t been full for many decades."
“We should not be buying Russian energy, but rather allow the people of our country to start producing like they did just one year ago.”
"I’m the one that ended [the Nord Stream 2] pipeline" from Russia to Germany.
“Just over one year ago, we had … record low gas prices."
"[T]he law allows Trump to tear up documents, shred them, and take documents when he left the White House."

President Biden “helped politicize the entire nomination process” by promising as a candidate in 2020 to appoint a Black woman to the Supreme Court. Ronald Reagan's promise to appoint a woman “isn't exactly the same.”
"Over 800 pounds of fentanyl were seized at our Southern Border in October. This is Biden’s Border Crisis."
“We’ve created more jobs in the first eight months of my administration than any president in American history.”
When Donald Trump was president "there was nobody saying, ‘Oh, gee, I don’t want to take it [the COVID-19 vaccine].’ Now they say that."

"I think the general officers here, and secretary, have made it very clear that they gave the president advice that he wouldn’t listen to. The last president, they gave him advice and he did listen to it."
"Look, when we had community policing initially in the late ’90s, violent crimes dropped significantly, significantly. And the reason it did is because we had significant number of police."
On the southern border: "I’ve been there before, and I haven’t — I mean, I know it well. ... now, my wife, Jill, has been down."
“The highest tax rate is 35%” for individual income.
President Joe Biden "has successfully guided this economy out of the teeth of a terrifying recession."
“As recently as yesterday, in mid-sentence, he [Biden] was cut off by someone in the White House who makes the decision that the president of the United States is not speaking correctly."
Under the Trump administration, the U.S. "didn’t need the Middle East" oil, and now “we’re going back to them asking them for help.”
Photo shows President Joe Biden's motorcade being met by swarm of Trump supporters during Biden's July 28, 2021, trip to Pennsylvania.
A Taliban takeover of Afghanistan is "not inevitable."
"This isn’t going to be anything like my predecessor, whose unpaid tax cuts and other spending added nearly $8 trillion in his four years to the national debt."
5 world leaders were killed or died because they “opposed vaccination of the citizens of their countries.”

"Joe Biden will never veto a bill. He’ll go down in history as a president who has never vetoed a bill, cause he will sign whatever Chuck Schumer and Nancy Pelosi put on his desk. ... They’re running the show."
“So the president continues to say, ‘It’s not the enhanced unemployment benefits keeping people home,’ well, yes, folks, it is."
"Since the time we took office, we’ve created more than 1.5 million jobs in the country. It’s the most jobs created in the first 100 days of any president on record."
"The April jobs report shows that Joe Biden is squandering the economic recovery he inherited from President Trump and Republicans in Congress.”

“Only about 6% of the president’s proposal actually goes" to infrastructure, meaning "water, wastewater ... highways, roads, bridges, perhaps broadband.”

"We’re now at a point where we’ve seen the average daily number of people vaccinated nearly double, from the week before I took office, to about 1.7 million average per day getting a shot."
